Title: Enhanced View Locations for MVC
Description:
Enhanced View Locations for MVC allows ASP.NET MVC developers more control over organizing their view folders.

The simple /views/{controller}/{view-name} + /views/{shared}/{view-name} scheme works great for smaller MVC projects. However, when building sites with many shared partial views and other well-factored view constructs, this scheme (especially the shared folder) quickly gets out of control and becomes a jumbled mess of many many files.

If you find yourself hunting through your view folders trying to locate that particular .cshtml file, then you'll benefit from this project.

Project Description
Enhanced View Locations for MVC allows ASP.NET MVC developers more control over organizing their view folders.

The simple /views/{controller}/{view-name} + /views/{shared}/{view-name} scheme works great for smaller MVC projects. However, when building sites with many shared partial views and other well-factored view constructs, this scheme (especially the shared folder) quickly gets out of control and becomes a jumbled mess of many many files.

If you find yourself hunting through your view folders trying to locate that particular .cshtml file, then you'll benefit from this project.



See the documentation for a simple usage example.

http://mvcviews.codeplex.com/documentation

This library is also available on NuGet:

http://nuget.org/List/Packages/EnhancedViewLocations
